Holistic Treatment Offerings

Acupuncture is a holistic practice restoring balance and well-being. Each session is uniquely tailored, starting with a comprehensive diagnosis and utilizing effective techniques to address your specific needs.

Diagnosis & Assessment

Your journey begins with a thorough assessment to understand your health and identify imbalances. We review your history, lifestyle, and symptoms, employing traditional techniques such as pulse checking, tongue examination, and abdominal palpation.

Treatment FAQ

How to prepare for my first visit?

Please complete online forms beforehand (approx. 20 mins). Have a light meal 1–2 hours prior and avoid coffee/stimulants.

How many treatments will I need?

It varies by condition. Acute issues may resolve quickly, while chronic conditions often require ongoing care for reliable results.

Are there side effects?

Most feel deep calm or relaxation. Some may feel energized. We recommend resting for the remainder of the day.
